item.title: Royalties
item.description: Valuing music, film, and projecting royalty flows.

item.title: Value added by music in public performance and home copying: economic theory and empirical applications for tariff setting
item.description: My short presentation highlighted the fact that the CEE region’s is much richer in terms of household cultural and recreational spending than music publishers believe.

item.title: Analysis of the Hungarian Private Copy Remuneration Scheme
item.description: The original title in Hungarian is Az üreshordozó díjrendszer vizsgálata.
